name: deimosrising
text: A comment left by deimosrising was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by FireAce, ishuta, Chetyre, littlecat, jdhenry105, cryztal, tttt, shrewbie, cryptfiend85, regrepnsnefpoh, jenever, sid, nutmeg, kenyot, Direhaggis, puguglypress, Panserbjorne)

name: jesler729
text: Seriously, you guys? 6 lames? Man.

name: semiquaver
text: A comment left by semiquaver was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by fakead, 7th_shot, instantkarma, LordPretzel, Doc_Rostov, pquinn87)

name: deimosrising
text: gobberwarts isn't even a real word you probably aren't going to find it in any thesauri

name: semiquaver
text: A comment left by semiquaver was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, 7th_shot, shrewbie, tao_of_poo, Connellingus, RedMange, LordPretzel, amandulence, LaserBlade, patrickjs5, Direhaggis, Doc_Rostov, pquinn87, Satyr)

name: direhaggis
text: I once saw a thesaurus stick its junk into an electrical socket. It quavered semi-ly before gobberwarts paroxysmically spewed from its genital intermediary.

name: farqussus
text: saying utilizing instead of using is the thing of what you saidery.

name: semiquaver
text: A comment left by semiquaver was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by goocifer, Gumfish, mystkmanat)

name: redmange
text: There is nothing good about what you are doing.

name: puguglypress
text: All nervously losing his tickle virginity to the lost episodes of Monty Python

name: tttt2
text: none of you are clever at all

name: dissembly
text: I chubbied it specifically for gobberwarts.

name: daidai
text: People hate to hear that achewood isnt always perfect

name: st-elmos_fire
text: People are lame, pointing out things that are not right with Achewood shows you care enough about it to realise when it might be wrong instead of being lazy by thinking it is always right.

name: sp1derbaby
text:
Well, I chubbied it.

Plus I learned a new word!

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
Why do the people in Achewood who need shooting, like the Taco Bell jerk, never get shot?
Where's the justice?

name: mangtastic
text: Justice is not comedy.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: True dat. Comedy is often the height of injustice.

name: robocop
text: for me it was the last panel. i was all like "aw fuck no. no one treats my molly that way." bc i sorta have a crush on molly. which isn't weird.

name: kingcrimson
text: The way Ray gives thumbs up and down even though Connie can't see is awesome.

name: fidget
text: The thumbs up/thumbs down really makes this for me.

name: deancain29
text: Ray is gesticulating the positive and negative of his conversation. I like it (thumbs up)

name: dumase
text: the best part is that there's no real indication that Roast Beef is even there watching anymore. Ray is just acting like how he feels.

name: soticoto
text: The second pillow on Cornelius's bed makes this for me, as do the lines on the back of his keyboard.

name: scramblesthedog
text: Not to mention the terrified look on Molly's face.  Ah, the joys of food service.

name: katal
text: I have to believe that Onstad watched a nasty customer berate a fastfood employee shortly before writing this strip.

name: chaesar
text: I don't know wht anyone in California would go to a Taco Bell when the place is probably littered with real taco stands that don't give you e. coli. The best pizza places are always local, I imagine it'd be true for tacos as well.

name: ssddr
text: Probably because a real taco stand wouldn't take shit like that.

name: lucidaconsole
text: california is lined with burrito trucks, magnificent marvelous burrito trucks. folks still go to taco bell because they don't trust the *trucks* to be sanitary, which is totally hilarious, because that means they trust the bell.

name: pwb
text: A comment left by pwb was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, molesticide, Audhumla, stormagnet)

name: zefiel
text: We don't have burritos in Mexico, except in the border.

name: greenkoolayd
text: liar.  i had a burrito the size of my forearm when i was in mexico.  unless theyve gotten rid of them since 2000.......

name: dougthehead
text: They just didn't make economic sense with the new peso.  It sucks, I know.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: What about SaniTaco?

name: cryztal
text:
Freaking Rosa Maria's in San Bernardino!

I hated that freaking city, but I still dream of their guacomole.

name: chloraloner
text: Perhaps he himself practiced the fine art of beratement as inspiration.

name: petitegitan
text: Molly doesn't deserve to be hated upon.

name: centipede_damascus
text: The Customer is always a Dick.

name: cheeks_jd
text: No one should be a dick to a stranger ever!

name: neoboman
text: Nothing will make you feel like more of a man than yelling at a young defenseless girl while she's at work. Good show.

name: riazm
text: Young? Dude, she's like three hundred.

name: dzieger
text:
Man, I'm really getting attached to the characters in this strip. I really wanted to slap that bastard in the lat panel, possibly challenge him to pistols at ten paces. Nobody talks that way to ... uh ... that anthopomorphized, illustrated cat ... character ...

I need therapy.

name: rodneystubbs
text:
Same. I got actually angry for a second when I read the last panel. Who has volume enough in the bozack to stand up for the cartoon cat? Me.

Dzieger don't forget our therapy session Saturday.

name: laudabilis
text: Agreed. But if you wanna slap HIM, don't look at the alt text. It'll make you go on a spree of some kind. And it won't be shopping.

name: atmus
text: That guy is just lucky Roast Beef wasn't there.  After his rages when someone insulted his Aibo, just picture what he would do to someone dissin his girl.

name: thesyndicate88
text: Say hi to Arthur for me guys!

name: joeyramoney
text: last panel is amazing.

name: pitseleh
text: This strip is giving me horrible flashbacks of my teen years working in fast food.

name: spinynorman
text: When you guys post one right after the other I really have to do a double take.

name: semiquaver
text: I think they should do an ebert and roeper thing on all the strips.  Mr. Ramone(y) weighs in with positive but uncapitalized sentence fragments, Pitseleh adds sniping and bad associations with his own life.

name: lunchbox
text: Ah damn, kinda like working at a DQ and having to fight with a customer who complains that his super dog is not big enough to show how big his penis is. Not that I would know or anything

name: peterjoel
text: Aha! I had been wondering why hotels provide that wireless keyboard. "The name of the movie that you are transcribing will not appear on your bill."

name: cailetshadow
text: Coincidentally, the last panel is also how "Raunch-ero Sauce" begins -- which Cornelius is currently transcribing!

name: lost_buoy
text: Pollice Verso!

name: g3k
text: The final panel is like a punch to the gut

name: bluecarrot
text: Why do people have to be mean to cashier clerks and fast food workers and anyone behind the counter? You just forget that they're people I guess, so you feel okay abusing them? Showing Molly getting harassed and putting it in a really negative light makes this strip a total 5

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Mangtastic, 7th_shot, Nlaw)

name: semiquaver
text: Yeah the lame limit just punishes people who read a lot more strips.  They should find a different way to administer that.

name: soticoto
text:
Like letting me make more accounts to get more lames?

.... Now I think about it, I'd probably just waste them on the same comments early on and run out at the same point.

On the flipside, sometimes I chubbie comments that criticise me or people who lame me... just for the hell of it.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: Holiday-Themed Party!

name: cherubrocker22
text: Panel 3: Ray demonstrates the tele-thumbs up.

name: direhaggis
text: The Spice Channel treats its incoming close-captioned staff very well.

name: doubleclef
text: Don't that feel like distant memory...

name: st-elmos_fire
text: "Rather dull rather quickly", using rather as many times as possible is an indication of class.

name: carlyle
text: Molly is so afriad.

name: greenkoolayd
text: if roastbeef hears about this, that guy is going wish he was wearing his brown underwear.....

name: hexjumper
text: Somebody should take that guy in the last panel outside and kick him in the neck.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: he is rude.
